author: Hovie
title: the meanest looking 2-legged mammoth ever
review:
Box/Instructions

Packaging is nice, as a standard constraction theme set. Instruction is nice, too. Nothing much to say here acutally.

Parts

New re-colored parts, I love the transparent light blue and reddish brown. Unfortunatelly, not much for the new parts, just only the body armor and Mungus head piece

The build

The build has no unique building techniques except for the shoulders and the weapon

The completed model

Looks very cool, sturdy, strong, well covered and evil. The LEGO team has done a great job capturing the look of a humanoid-mammoth

Overall opinion

Pros:

+Re-colored parts
+Evil, mean looking
+New great head piece
+Good for both play and display

Cons:

+Weapon is not staying in it's place

Although this is one of the best chima constration set for this year, I recommend you guys should buy this set if you love chima or hero factory or both.
